report.title: Recent Observations in Survey
report.description: Lists the most recent recordings in a specified survey.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM samples s JOIN occurrences o ON o.sample_id=s.id and o.deleted=false LEFT JOIN occurrence_images oi ON oi.occurrence_id=o.id and oi.deleted=false JOIN surveys su ON s.survey_id = su.id JOIN list_taxa_taxon_lists lttl ON lttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id LEFT JOIN locations l ON l.id=s.location_id and l.deleted=false LEFT JOIN users u ON u.id=o.verified_by_id WHERE su.id=#survey# AND o.record_status NOT IN ('I','R','T') AND st_intersects(s.geom, st_geomfromtext('#searchArea#',900913)) AND s.deleted=false #order_by#
report.field_sql: su.title, su.website_id, o.id as occurrence_id, s.date_start, s.date_end, s.date_type, lttl.taxon, s.entered_sref, l.name as location_name, oi.path, CASE o.record_status WHEN 'C' THEN 'Data Entry Complete' WHEN 'V' THEN 'Verified' WHEN 'R' THEN 'Rejected' WHEN 'I' THEN 'In Progress' WHEN 'T' THEN 'Test' WHEN 'S' THEN 'Sent for verification' ELSE '' END AS record_status, st_astext(s.geom) as geom, u.username as verified_by

param.name: survey
param.description: Select the survey to return data for
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys
